trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESXMS2017MOUNT_00439_COMMITTEE00439_000_000<tab>As you have no doubt noticed, the Starlight Celebration is in full swing. Would you like to join the festivities? Amh Garanjy is in Gridania looking for more little helpers!

TEXT_FESXMS2017MOUNT_00439_COMMITTEE00439_000_010<tab>You can leave trussing up the treants and recovering the stolen decorations to us. All you need to do is ride <var 09 E948 ((Kochab)) ((<var 08 E905 ((Kochab)) ((Polaris)) /var>)) ((Pferkad)) ((Kochab)) ((Polaris)) ((<var 08 E905 ((Kochab)) ((Polaris)) /var>)) ((Polaris)) ((Kochab)) /var> and give those thieves a face full of starburst!

TEXT_FESXMS2017MOUNT_00439_COMMITTEE00439_000_020<tab>Would you like to hunt down some more decoration-pinching treants? <var 09 E948 ((Kochab)) ((<var 08 E905 ((Kochab)) ((Polaris)) /var>)) ((Pferkad)) ((Kochab)) ((Polaris)) ((<var 08 E905 ((Kochab)) ((Polaris)) /var>)) ((Polaris)) ((Kochab)) /var> is ready to go!
